topic.title: Part I: Illustrative presentation of financial statements

row.entry: XYZ Group – Statement of financial position as at 31 December 20X7 (in thousands of currency units)
XYZ Group – Statement of financial position as at 31 December 20X7 (in thousands of currency units)

p.b: Equity attributable to owners of the parent

row.entry: Examples of statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income when IAS 39 Financial Instruments: Recognition and Measurement is applied XYZ Group – Statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income for the year ended 31 December 20X7 (illustrating the presentation of profit or loss and other comprehensive income in one statement and the classification of expenses within profit or loss by function) (in thousands of currency units)

p.b: Profit for the year from continuing operations

entry.p: Loss for the year from discontinued operations
Items that will not be reclassified to profit or loss:
Remeasurements of defined benefit pension plans
Share of other comprehensive income of associates
Income tax relating to items that will not be reclassified
Items that may be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss:
Exchange differences on translating foreign operations
Income tax relating to items that may be reclassified(c)

p.b: Other comprehensive income for the year, net of tax
TOTAL COMPREHENSIVE INCOME FOR THE YEAR

entry.p: Alternatively, items of other comprehensive income could be presented in the statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income net of tax.

p.b: Other comprehensive income for the year, after tax:
Items that will not be reclassified to profit or loss:

entry.p: Remeasurements of defined benefit pension plans
Share of other comprehensive income of associates

p.b: Items that may be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss:

entry.p: Exchange differences on translating foreign operations

p.b: Other comprehensive income for the year, net of tax

row.entry: XYZ Group – Statement of profit or loss for the year ended 31 December 20X7 (illustrating the presentation of profit or loss and other comprehensive income in two statements and the classification of expenses within profit or loss by nature) (in thousands of currency units)

entry.p: Changes in inventories of finished goods and work in progress
Work performed by the entity and capitalised
Impairment of property, plant and equipment

p.b: Profit for the year from continuing operations

row.entry: XYZ Group – Statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income for the year ended 31 December 20X7 (illustrating the presentation of profit or loss and other comprehensive income in two statements) (in thousands of currency units)

entry.p: Items that will not be reclassified to profit or loss:
Remeasurements of defined benefit pension plans
Share of other comprehensive income of associates
Income tax relating to items that will not be reclassified
Items that may be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss:
Exchange differences on translating foreign operations
Income tax relating to items that may be reclassified(b)

p.b: Other comprehensive income for the year, net of tax
TOTAL COMPREHENSIVE INCOME FOR THE YEAR

entry.p: Alternatively, items of other comprehensive income could be presented, net of tax. Refer to the statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income illustrating the presentation of income and expenses in one statement.
